" Not at all . "[255-margaret]

" There s just one question-- "[2005-i]

[She]255-margaret shook [her]255-margaret head . [He]2003-you looked a little bewildered as [they]2006-they parted .

[They]2006-they parted without shaking hands ; [she]255-margaret had kept the interview , for [his]2003-you sake , in tints of the quietest grey . [She]255-margaret thrilled with happiness ere [she]255-margaret reached [[her]255-margaret house]1287-her house . [Others]802-others had loved [her]255-margaret in the past , if one apply to [their]802-others brief desires so grave a word , but [the others]3989-the others had been " [ninnies"--young[3989-the others] men who had nothing to do]4963-ninnies"--young men who had nothing to do , [old men who could find [nobody]4513-nobody]2010-old men who could find nobody better . And [she]255-margaret had often loved , too , but only so far as the facts of sex demanded : mere yearnings for the masculine sex to be dismissed for what they were worth , with a sigh . Never before had [her]255-margaret personality been touched . [She]255-margaret was not young or very rich , and it amazed [her]255-margaret that [a man of any standing]2012-a man of any standing should take [her]255-margaret seriously . As [she]255-margaret sat , trying to do accounts in [[her]255-margaret empty house]2013-her empty house , amidst beautiful pictures and noble books , waves of emotion broke , as if a tide of passion was flowing through the night air . [She]255-margaret shook [her]255-margaret head , tried to concentrate [her]255-margaret attention , and failed . In vain did [she]255-margaret repeat : " But [I]255-margaret ve been through this sort of thing before . "[255-margaret] [She]255-margaret had never been through it ; the big machinery , as opposed to the little , had been set in motion , and the idea that [Mr. Wilcox]258-charles loved , obsessed [her]255-margaret before [she]255-margaret came to love [him]258-charles in return .

[She]255-margaret would come to no decision yet . " Oh , [sir]3939-sir , this is so sudden"--that[255-margaret] prudish phrase exactly expressed [her]255-margaret when [her]255-margaret time came . Premonitions are not preparation . [She]255-margaret must examine more closely [her]255-margaret own nature and [his]258-charles ; [she]255-margaret must talk it over judicially with [Helen]254-helen . It had been a strange love - scene -- the central radiance unacknowledged from first to last . [She]255-margaret , in [his]258-charles place , would have said Ich liebe dich , but perhaps it was not [his]258-charles habit to open the heart . [He]258-charles might have done it if [she]255-margaret had pressed [him]258-charles -- as a matter of duty , perhaps ; [England]34-england expects [every man]2014-every man to open [his]2014-every man heart once ; but the effort would have jarred [him]258-charles , and never , if [she]255-margaret could avoid it , should [he]258-charles lose those defences that [he]258-charles had chosen to raise against [the world]745-the world . [He]258-charles must never be bothered with emotional talk , or with a display of sympathy . [He]258-charles was [an elderly man]2016-an elderly man now , and it would be futile and impudent to correct [him]258-charles .

[Mrs. Wilcox]512-mrs. wilcox strayed in and out , ever [a welcome ghost]2017-a welcome ghost ; surveying the scene , thought [Margaret]255-margaret , without one hint of bitterness .

CHAPTER XIX

If one wanted to show [a foreigner]2018-a foreigner [England]34-england , perhaps the wisest course would be to take [him]2018-a foreigner to [the final section of [the Purbeck Hills]156-the purbeck hills]2019-the final section of the purbeck hills , and stand [him]2018-a foreigner on [[their]156-the purbeck hills summit]2020-their summit , a few miles to [the east of [Corfe]157-corfe]2021-the east of corfe . Then system after system of [[our]2022-our island]2023-our island would roll together under [his]2018-a foreigner feet . Beneath [him]2018-a foreigner is [the valley of [the Frome]158-the frome]2024-the valley of the frome , and [all the wild lands that come tossing down from [Dorchester]159-dorchester]2025-all the wild lands that come tossing down from dorchester , black and gold , to mirror [their]2025-all the wild lands that come tossing down from dorchester gorse in [the expanses of [Poole]160-poole]2026-the expanses of poole . [The valley of [the Stour]161-the stour]2027-the valley of the stour is beyond , [unaccountable stream]2028-unaccountable stream , dirty at [Blandford]162-blandford , pure at [Wimborne]163-wimborne -- [the Stour]161-the stour , sliding out of [fat fields]2029-fat fields , to marry the Avon beneath [the tower of Christ church]2030-the tower of christ church . [The valley of [the Avon]164-the avon]2031-the valley of the avon -- invisible , but far to the north the trained eye may see Clearbury Ring that guards [it]2031-the valley of the avon , and the imagination may leap beyond that on to [Salisbury Plain itself]165-salisbury plain itself , and beyond [the Plain]2032-the plain to [all the glorious downs of [Central England]166-central england]2033-all the glorious downs of central england . Nor is [Suburbia]35-suburbia absent . [Bournemouth s ignoble coast]2034-bournemouth s ignoble coast cowers to the right , heralding the pine - trees that mean , for all [their]2025-all the wild lands that come tossing down from dorchester beauty , red houses , and the Stock Exchange , and extend to the gates of [London]2-london itself . So tremendous is [the City s trail]2035-the city s trail ! But [the cliffs of [Freshwater]167-freshwater]2036-the cliffs of freshwater [it]2037-it shall never touch , and [the island]2038-the island will guard [the Island]168-the island s purity till the end of time . Seen from the west [the Wight]169-the wight is beautiful beyond all laws of beauty . It is as if a fragment of [England]34-england floated forward to greet the foreigner -- chalk of [[our]2039-our chalk]2040-our chalk , turf of [our]2039-our turf , epitome of what will follow . And behind the fragment lies [Southampton]152-southampton , hostess to [the nations]2041-the nations , and [Portsmouth]170-portsmouth , a latent fire , and all around [it]170-portsmouth , with double and treble collision of tides , swirls [the sea]811-the sea . How [many villages]2043-many villages appear in this view ! How many [castles]2044-castles ! How [many churches]2045-many churches , vanished or triumphant ! How many [ships]2046-ships , [railways]4192-railways , and [roads]2048-roads ! What incredible variety of [men working beneath that lucent sky to what final end]2049-men working beneath that lucent sky to what final end ! The reason fails , like a wave on [the Swanage beach]2050-the swanage beach ; the imagination swells , spreads , and deepens , until it becomes geographic and encircles [England]34-england .

So [Frieda Mosebach]287-frieda , now [Frau Architect Liesecke]429-frau liesecke , and mother to [[her]287-frieda husband s baby]2051-her husband s baby , was brought up to these heights to be impressed , and , after a prolonged gaze , [she]287-frieda said that [the hills]2052-the hills were more swelling here than in [Pomerania]90-pomerania , which was true , but did not seem to [Mrs. Munt]264-mrs. munt apposite . [Poole Harbour]178-poole harbour was dry , which led [her]287-frieda to praise the absence of muddy foreshore at [Friedrich Wilhelms Bad]172-friedrich wilhelms bad , [Rugen]173-rugen , where beech - trees hang over [the tideless Baltic]76-the baltic , and cows may contemplate the brine . Rather unhealthy [Mrs. Munt]264-mrs. munt thought this would be , water being safer when it moved about .

" And [[your]264-mrs. munt English lakes]4965-your english lakes -- [Vindermere]175-vindermere , [Grasmere]3-germany [they]4965-your english lakes , then , unhealthy ? "[287-frieda]

" No , [Frau Liesecke]429-frau liesecke ; but that is because they are fresh water , and different . [Salt water]4966-salt water ought to have tides , and go up and down a great deal , or else it smells . Look , for instance , at [an aquarium]4967-an aquarium . "[287-frieda]

" [An aquarium]4967-an aquarium ! Oh , [MEESIS]264-mrs. munt [Munt]264-mrs. munt , [you]264-mrs. munt mean to tell [me]287-frieda that fresh aquariums stink less than salt ? Why , then [Victor]430-victor , [[my]287-frieda brother - in - law]4969-my brother - in - law , collected many tadpoles-- "[287-frieda] " [You]264-mrs. munt are not to say stink , "[254-helen] interrupted [Helen]254-helen ; " at least , [you]264-mrs. munt may say it , but [you]264-mrs. munt must pretend [you]264-mrs. munt are being funny while [you]264-mrs. munt say it . "[254-helen]

" Then smell . And the mud of [your]264-mrs. munt Pool down there -- does it not smell , or may [I]287-frieda say stink , ha , ha ? "[287-frieda]

" There always has been mud in [Poole Harbour]178-poole harbour , "[264-mrs. munt] said [Mrs. Munt]264-mrs. munt , with a slight frown . " [The rivers]4970-the rivers bring it down , and [a most valuable oyster - fishery]4971-a most valuable oyster - fishery depends upon it . "[264-mrs. munt]

" Yes , that is so , "[287-frieda] conceded [Frieda]287-frieda ; and another international incident was closed .

" [Bournemouth]104-bournemouth is , "[2054-their hostess] resumed [[their]2053-their hostess]2054-their hostess , quoting a local rhyme to which [she]2054-their hostess was much attached-- " [Bournemouth]104-bournemouth is , [Poole]160-poole was , and [Swanage]12-swanage is to be [the most important town of all]4972-the most important town of all and biggest of the three . The remark fell damply on the conversation . Thus [she]255-margaret spoke before the wedding ceremony and the physical union , before the astonishing glass shade had fallen that interposes between [married couples]2089-married couples and [the world]745-the world . [She]255-margaret was to keep [her]255-margaret independence more than do most women as yet . " So with [him]258-charles , "[255-margaret] [she]255-margaret continued . " There are heaps of things in [him]258-charles -- more especially things that [he]258-charles does that will always be hidden from [me]255-margaret . " If [Wilcoxes]260-the wilcoxes hadn t worked and died in [England]34-england for thousands of years , [you]5018-you and [I]255-margaret couldn t sit [here]3846-here without having [our]5020-our throats cut . There was a long silence , during which the tide returned into [Poole Harbour]178-poole harbour . " [One]3797-one would lose something , "[254-helen] murmured [Helen]254-helen , apparently to [herself]254-helen . What did it mean ? For what end are [her]2097-her fair complexities , [her]2097-her changes of soil , [[her]2097-her sinuous coast]2099-her sinuous coast ? Does [she]2097-her belong to [those who have moulded [her]2097-her and made [her]2097-her feared by [other lands]2101-other lands]2100-those who have moulded her and made her feared by other lands , or to [those who have added nothing to [her]2097-her power]2102-those who have added nothing to her power , but have somehow seen [her]2097-her , seen [the whole island]2103-the whole island at once , lying as a jewel in [a silver sea]2104-a silver sea , sailing as a ship of souls , with all [the brave world s fleet]2105-the brave world s fleet accompanying [her]2097-her towards eternity ?

[CHAPTER XX

Margaret]255-margaret had often wondered at the disturbance that takes place in [the world s waters]2106-the world s waters , when [Love]434-love , who seems so tiny a pebble , slips in . Whom does [Love]434-love concern beyond [the beloved]2107-the beloved and [the lover]2108-the lover ? Yet [his]434-love impact deluges [a hundred shores]2109-a hundred shores . No doubt the disturbance is really the spirit of [the generations]2110-the generations , welcoming [the new generation]2111-the new generation , and chafing against the ultimate Fate , who holds all the seas in the palm of [her]2112-her hand . But [Love]434-love can not understand this . [He]434-love can not comprehend another s infinity ; [he]434-love is conscious only of [his]434-love own -- flying sunbeam , falling rose , pebble that asks for one quiet plunge below the fretting interplay of space and time . [He]434-love knows that [he]434-love will survive at the end of things , and be gathered by [Fate]435-fate as a jewel from the slime , and be handed with admiration round [the assembly of the gods]2113-the assembly of the gods . " [Men]3835-men did produce this "[2114-they] [they]2114-they will say , and , saying , [they]2114-they will give [men]3835-men immortality . But meanwhile -- what agitations meanwhile ! The foundations of Property and Propriety are laid bare , twin rocks ; [Family Pride]2116-family pride flounders to the surface , puffing and blowing and refusing to be comforted ; [Theology]436-theology , vaguely ascetic , gets up a nasty ground swell . Then [the lawyers]2117-the lawyers are aroused -- cold brood -- and creep out of [their]2117-the lawyers holes . [They]2117-the lawyers do what [they]2117-the lawyers can ; [they]2117-the lawyers tidy up Property and Propriety , reassure [Theology]436-theology and [Family Pride]2116-family pride . Half - guineas are poured on [the troubled waters]2119-the troubled waters , [the lawyers]2117-the lawyers creep back , and , if all has gone well , [Love]434-love joins [one man]2121-one man and [woman]3834-woman together in Matrimony .

[Margaret]255-margaret had expected the disturbance , and was not irritated by it . For [a sensitive woman]2123-a sensitive woman [she]2123-a sensitive woman had steady nerves , and could bear with the incongruous and the grotesque ; and , besides , there was nothing excessive about [her]2123-a sensitive woman love - affair . Good - humour was the dominant note of [her]2123-a sensitive woman relations with [Mr. Wilcox]258-charles , or , as [I]3-germany must now call [him]258-charles , [Henry]355-henry . [Henry]355-henry did not encourage romance , and [she]2123-a sensitive woman was [no girl]2124-no girl to fidget for it . [An acquaintance]2125-an acquaintance had become [a lover]2126-a lover , might become [a husband]4555-a husband , but would retain all that [she]2123-a sensitive woman had noted in the acquaintance ; and love must confirm an old relation rather than reveal a new one .

In this spirit [she]2123-a sensitive woman promised to marry [him]355-henry .

[He]355-henry was in [Swanage]12-swanage on the morrow bearing the engagement ring .

[They]2128-they greeted [one another]3933-one another with a hearty cordiality that impressed [Aunt Juley]263-aunt juley . [Henry]355-henry dined at [The Bays]1944-the bays , but had engaged [a bedroom in [the principal hotel]2132-the principal hotel]2131-a bedroom in the principal hotel ; [he]355-henry was [one of [those men who know [the principal hotel]2132-the principal hotel]2134-those men who know the principal hotel by instinct]2133-one of those men who know the principal hotel by instinct . After dinner [he]355-henry asked [Margaret]255-margaret if [she]255-margaret wouldn t care for a turn on the Parade . [She]255-margaret accepted , and could not repress a little tremor ; it would be [her]255-margaret first real love scene . But as [she]255-margaret put on [her]255-margaret hat [she]255-margaret burst out laughing . Love was so unlike the article served up in books ; the joy , though genuine was different ; the mystery an unexpected mystery . For one thing , [Mr. Wilcox]258-charles still seemed [a stranger]2136-a stranger .

For a time [they]2137-they talked about the ring ; then [she]255-margaret said : " Do [you]355-henry remember [the Embankment at [Chelsea]151-chelsea]5029-the embankment at chelsea ? It can t be ten days ago . "[255-margaret]

" Yes , "[355-henry] [he]355-henry said , laughing . " And [you]355-henry and [[your]355-henry sister]4244-your sister were head and ears deep in some Quixotic scheme . [Ah]5031-ah well ! "[355-henry]

" [I]255-margaret little thought then , certainly . Did [you]355-henry ? "[255-margaret]

But [Henry]355-henry had no intention of telling . " [I]255-margaret didn t think of it , "[255-margaret] [she]255-margaret pursued . [Margaret]255-margaret could not help laughing . It was the first [she]255-margaret had heard of the mews behind [Ducie Street]130-ducie street . When [she]255-margaret was [a possible tenant]2146-a possible tenant [it]2147-it had suppressed itself , not consciously , but automatically . When [Henry]355-henry lived in [Ducie Street]130-ducie street [he]355-henry remembered the mews ; when [he]355-henry tried to let [he]355-henry forgot it ; and if [any one]4050-any one had remarked that the mews must be either there or not , [he]355-henry would have felt annoyed , and afterwards have found some opportunity of stigmatising [the speaker]1699-the speaker as academic . [A younger woman]2162-a younger woman might have resented [his]258-charles masterly ways , but [Margaret]255-margaret had too firm a grip of life to make a fuss . [She]255-margaret was , in [her]255-margaret own way , as masterly . If [he]258-charles was [a fortress]1006-a fortress [she]255-margaret was [a mountain peak]2164-a mountain peak , whom all might tread , but whom the snows made nightly virginal . Disdaining the heroic outfit , excitable in [her]255-margaret methods , garrulous , episodical , shrill , [she]255-margaret misled [[her]255-margaret lover]1789-her lover much as [she]255-margaret had misled [[her]255-margaret aunt]546-her aunt . [He]258-charles mistook [her]255-margaret fertility for Weakness . [He]258-charles supposed [her]255-margaret " as clever as [they]5089-they make [them]5089-they , "[255-margaret] but no more , not realising that [she]255-margaret was penetrating to the depths of [his]258-charles soul , and approving of what [she]255-margaret found there .

And if insight were sufficient , if the inner life were the whole of life , [their]2167-their happiness had been assured .

[They]2167-their walked ahead briskly . [The parade]2168-the parade and [the road]999-the road after [it]2168-the parade were well lighted , but it was darker in [[Aunt Juley]263-aunt juley s garden]2170-aunt juley s garden . As [they]2167-their were going up by the side - paths , through some rhododendrons , [Mr. Wilcox]258-charles , who was in front , said " [Margaret]255-margaret "[258-charles] rather huskily , turned , dropped [his]258-charles cigar , and took [her]255-margaret in [his]258-charles arms .

[She]255-margaret was startled , and nearly screamed , but recovered [herself]255-margaret at once , and kissed with genuine love the lips that were pressed against [her]255-margaret own . It was [their]2167-their first kiss , and when it was over [he]258-charles saw [her]255-margaret safely to the door and rang the bell for [her]255-margaret but disappeared into the night before [the maid]1169-the maid answered it . On looking back , the incident displeased [her]255-margaret . It was so isolated . Nothing in [their]2167-their previous conversation had heralded it , and , worse still , no tenderness had ensued . If [a man]569-a man can not lead up to passion [he]569-a man can at all events lead down from it , and [she]255-margaret had hoped , after [her]255-margaret complaisance , for some interchange of gentle words . But [he]258-charles had hurried away as if ashamed , and for an instant [she]255-margaret was reminded of [Helen]254-helen and [Paul]256-paul .

CHAPTER XXI

[Charles]258-charles had just been scolding [[his]258-charles Dolly]2173-his dolly . [She]2173-his dolly deserved the scolding , and had bent before it , but [her]2173-his dolly head , though bloody was unsubdued and [her]2173-his dolly chirrupings began to mingle with [his]258-charles retreating thunder .

" [You]2173-his dolly ve waked [the baby]5090-the baby . [I]255-margaret knew [you]2173-his dolly would . ( Rum - ti - foo , Rackety - tackety - Tompkin ! ) [I]255-margaret m not responsible for what [Uncle Percy]439-uncle percy does , nor for [anybody else]5091-anybody else or anything , so there ! "[255-margaret]

" Who asked [him]439-uncle percy while [I]2173-his dolly was away ? Who asked [[my]2173-his dolly sister]4024-my sister down to meet [him]439-uncle percy ? Who sent [them]5093-them out in [the motor]3839-the motor day after day ? "[2173-his dolly]

" [Charles]258-charles , that reminds [me]255-margaret of some poem . "[255-margaret]

" Does it indeed ? [We]5095-we shall all be dancing to a very different music presently . [Miss Schlegel]254-helen has fairly got [us]5095-we on toast . "[2173-his dolly]

" [I]255-margaret could simply scratch [that woman]5096-that woman s eyes out , and to say it s [my]255-margaret fault is most unfair . "[255-margaret]

" It s [your]258-charles fault , and five months ago [you]258-charles admitted it . "[2173-his dolly]

" [I]255-margaret didn t. "[255-margaret]

" [You]255-margaret did . "[2173-his dolly]

" [Tootle]440-tootle , tootle , playing on the pootle ! "[2174-dolly] exclaimed [Dolly]2174-dolly , suddenly devoting [herself]2174-dolly to [the child]2175-the child .

" It s all very well to turn the conversation , but [father]699-father would never have dreamt of marrying as long as [Evie]262-evie was there to make [him]699-father comfortable . But [you]258-charles must needs start match - making . Besides , [Cahill]410-mr. cahill s too old . "[255-margaret]

" Of course , if [you]258-charles re going to be rude to [Uncle Percy]439-uncle percy . "[2175-the child]

" [Miss Schlegel]254-helen always meant to get hold of [Howards End]339-howards end , and , thanks to [you]258-charles , [she]254-helen s got it . "[255-margaret]

" [I]2175-the child call the way [you]258-charles twist things round and make them hang together most unfair . [You]258-charles couldn t have been nastier if [you]258-charles d caught [me]2175-the child flirting . Could [he]439-uncle percy , [diddums]5098-diddums ? "[2175-the child]

" [We]5099-we re in a bad hole , and must make the best of it . [I]255-margaret shall answer [the pater]5100-the pater s letter civilly . [He]439-uncle percy s evidently anxious to do the decent thing . But [I]255-margaret do not intend to forget these [Schlegels]267-the schlegels in a hurry . As long as [they]5101-their re on [their]5101-their best behaviour -- [Dolly]5102-dolly , are [you]5102-dolly listening?--we ll behave , too . But if [I]255-margaret find [them]5101-their giving [themselves]5101-their airs or monopolising [[my]255-margaret father]3913-my father , or at all ill - treating [him]3913-my father , or worrying [him]3913-my father with [their]5101-their artistic beastliness , [I]255-margaret intend to put [my]255-margaret foot down , yes , firmly . Taking [[my]255-margaret mother]4456-my mother s place ! [Heaven]441-heaven knows what poor old [Paul]256-paul will say when the news reaches [him]256-paul . "[255-margaret]

The interlude closes . It has taken place in [[Charles]258-charles s garden at [Hilton]32-hilton]2176-charles s garden at hilton . [He]258-charles and [Dolly]2177-dolly are sitting in deckchairs , and [their]2178-them motor is regarding [them]2178-them placidly from [[its]2179-its garage]2180-its garage across [the lawn]3816-the lawn . A short - frocked edition of [Charles]258-charles also regards [them]2178-them placidly ; a perambulator edition is squeaking ; a third edition is expected shortly . Nature is turning out [Wilcoxes]260-the wilcoxes in [this peaceful abode]2182-this peaceful abode , so that [they]260-the wilcoxes may inherit [the earth]1372-the earth .

CHAPTER XXII

[Margaret]255-margaret greeted [[her]255-margaret lord]2184-her lord with peculiar tenderness on the morrow . Mature as [he]2184-her lord was , [she]255-margaret might yet be able to help [him]2184-her lord to the building of [the rainbow bridge that should connect the prose in [us]2186-us with the passion]2185-the rainbow bridge that should connect the prose in us with the passion . Without it [we]2186-us are meaningless fragments , [half monks]2187-half monks , half beasts , unconnected arches that have never joined into [a man]569-a man . With it love is born , and alights on the highest curve , glowing against the grey , sober against the fire . [Happy]2189-happy [the man who sees from either aspect the glory of these outspread wings]2190-the man who sees from either aspect the glory of these outspread wings . The roads of [his]2184-her lord soul lie clear , and [he]2184-her lord and [[his]2184-her lord friends]1779-his friends shall find easy - going .

It was hard - going in [the roads of [Mr. Wilcox]258-charles s soul]2192-the roads of mr. wilcox s soul . From boyhood [he]2184-her lord had neglected [them]2192-the roads of mr. wilcox s soul . " [I]2184-her lord am not [a fellow who bothers about [my]2184-her lord own inside]5105-a fellow who bothers about my own inside . "[2184-her lord] Outwardly [he]2184-her lord was cheerful , reliable , and brave ; but within , all had reverted to chaos , ruled , so far as it was ruled at all , by an incomplete asceticism . Whether as [boy]2193-boy , [husband]1197-husband , or [widower]2195-widower , [he]2184-her lord had always the sneaking belief that bodily passion is bad , a belief that is desirable only when held passionately . Religion had confirmed [him]2184-her lord . The words that were read aloud on Sunday to [him]2184-her lord and to [other respectable men]2196-other respectable men were the words that had once kindled the souls of [St. Catherine]442-st. catherine and [St. Francis]443-st. francis into a white - hot hatred of the carnal . [He]2184-her lord could not be as [the saints]2197-the saints and love [the Infinite]444-the infinite with a seraphic ardour , but [he]2184-her lord could be a little ashamed of loving [a wife]1409-a wife . [Amabat]445-amabat , amare timebat . And it was here that [Margaret]255-margaret hoped to help [him]2184-her lord .

It did not seem so difficult . [She]255-margaret need trouble [him]2184-her lord with no gift of [her]255-margaret own . [She]255-margaret would only point out the salvation that was latent in [his]2184-her lord own soul , and in the soul of [every man]2014-every man . Only connect ! That was the whole of [her]255-margaret sermon . Only connect the prose and the passion , and both will be exalted , and human love will be seen at its height . Live in fragments no longer . Only connect and the beast and [the monk , robbed of the isolation that is life to either]2200-the monk , robbed of the isolation that is life to either , will die .

Nor was the message difficult to give . It need not take the form of a good " talking . "[2200-the monk , robbed of the isolation that is life to either] By quiet indications [the bridge]1755-the bridge would be built and span [their]2202-their lives with beauty .

But [she]255-margaret failed . For there was one quality in [Henry]355-henry for which [she]255-margaret was never prepared , however much [she]255-margaret reminded [herself]255-margaret of it : [his]355-henry obtuseness . [He]355-henry simply did not notice things , and there was no more to be said . [He]355-henry never noticed that [Helen]254-helen and [Frieda]287-frieda were hostile , or that [Tibby]259-tibby was not interested in currant plantations ; [he]355-henry never noticed the lights and shades that exist in the greyest conversation , the finger - posts , the milestones , the collisions , the illimitable views . Once -- on another occasion -- [she]255-margaret scolded [him]355-henry about it . [He]355-henry was puzzled , but replied with a laugh : " [My]355-henry motto is Concentrate . [I]355-henry ve no intention of frittering away [my]355-henry strength on that sort of thing . "[355-henry] " It isn t frittering away the strength , "[255-margaret] [she]255-margaret protested . " It s enlarging the space in which [you]355-henry may be strong . "[355-henry] [He]355-henry answered : " [You]255-margaret re [a clever little woman]5106-a clever little woman , but [my]355-henry motto s Concentrate . "[355-henry] And this morning [he]355-henry concentrated with a vengeance .

[They]2203-we met in the rhododendrons of yesterday . In the daylight the bushes were inconsiderable and the path was bright in the morning sun . [She]255-margaret was with [Helen]254-helen , who had been ominously quiet since the affair was settled . " Here [we]2203-we all are ! "[255-margaret] [she]255-margaret cried , and took [him]355-henry by one hand , retaining [[her]255-margaret sister]544-her sister s in the other .

" Here [we]2203-we are . Good - morning , [Helen]254-helen . "[255-margaret]

CHAPTER XXIII

[Margaret]255-margaret had no intention of letting things slide , and the evening before [she]255-margaret left [Swanage]12-swanage [she]255-margaret gave [[her]255-margaret sister]544-her sister a thorough scolding . [She]255-margaret censured [her]544-her sister , not for disapproving of the engagement , but for throwing over [her]255-margaret disapproval a veil of mystery . [Helen]254-helen was equally frank . " Yes , "[254-helen] [she]254-helen said , with the air of one looking inwards , " there is a mystery . [I]254-helen can t help it . It s not [my]254-helen fault . It s the way life has been made . "[254-helen] [Helen]254-helen in those days was over - interested in the subconscious self . [She]254-helen exaggerated the Punch and Judy aspect of life , and spoke of [mankind]2230-mankind as puppets , whom [an invisible showman]2231-an invisible showman twitches into love and war . [Margaret]255-margaret pointed out that if [she]255-margaret dwelt on this [she]255-margaret , too , would eliminate the personal . [Helen]254-helen was silent for a minute , and then burst into a queer speech , which cleared the air . " Go on and marry [him]5168-him . [I]254-helen think [you]254-helen re splendid ; and if [any one]4050-any one can pull it off , [you]254-helen will . "[254-helen] [Margaret]255-margaret denied that there was anything to " pull off , "[255-margaret] but [she]255-margaret continued : " Yes , there is , and [I]255-margaret wasn t up to it with [Paul]256-paul . [I]255-margaret can do only what s easy . [I]255-margaret can only entice and be enticed . [I]255-margaret can t , and won t , attempt difficult relations . If [I]255-margaret marry , it will either be [a man who s strong enough to boss [me]255-margaret or whom [I]255-margaret m strong enough to boss]5170-a man who s strong enough to boss me or whom i m strong enough to boss . So [I]255-margaret shan t ever marry , for there aren t [such men]1610-such men . And [Heaven]441-heaven help [any one whom [I]255-margaret do marry]5172-any one whom i do marry , for [I]255-margaret shall certainly run away from [him]5172-any one whom i do marry before [you]255-margaret can say [Jack Robinson]318-jacky . There ! Because [I]255-margaret m uneducated . But [you]255-margaret , [you]255-margaret re different ; [you]255-margaret re [a heroine]5173-a heroine . "[255-margaret]

" Oh , [Helen]254-helen ! Am [I]255-margaret ? Will it be as dreadful for [poor Henry]355-henry as all that ? "[255-margaret]

" [You]255-margaret mean to keep proportion , and that s heroic , it s [Greek]5174-greek , and [I]255-margaret don t see why it shouldn t succeed with [you]255-margaret . Go on and fight with [him]5172-any one whom i do marry and help [him]5172-any one whom i do marry . Don t ask [me]255-margaret for help , or even for sympathy . Henceforward [I]255-margaret m going [my]255-margaret own way . [I]255-margaret mean to be thorough , because thoroughness is easy . [I]255-margaret mean to dislike [[your]255-margaret husband]5175-your husband , and to tell [him]5172-any one whom i do marry so . [I]255-margaret mean to make no concessions to [Tibby]259-tibby . If [Tibby]259-tibby wants to live with [me]255-margaret , [he]259-tibby must lump [me]255-margaret . [I]255-margaret mean to love [you]255-margaret more than ever . Yes , [I]255-margaret do . [You]255-margaret and [I]255-margaret have built up something real , because it is purely spiritual . There s no veil of mystery over [us]5176-us . Unreality and mystery begin as soon as [one]3797-one touches the body . The popular view is , as usual , exactly the wrong one . [Our]5176-us bothers are over tangible things -- money , [husbands]4561-husbands , house - hunting . But Heaven will work of itself . "[255-margaret]

[Margaret]255-margaret was grateful for this expression of affection , and answered , " Perhaps . "[255-margaret] All vistas close in the unseen -- [no one]633-no one doubts it -- but [Helen]254-helen closed them rather too quickly for [her]254-helen taste . At every turn of speech [one]3797-one was confronted with reality and the absolute . Perhaps [Margaret]255-margaret grew too old for metaphysics , perhaps [Henry]355-henry was weaning [her]255-margaret from [them]2234-them , but [she]255-margaret felt that there was something a little unbalanced in the mind that so readily shreds the visible . [The business man who assumes that this life is everything]2235-the business man who assumes that this life is everything , and [the mystic who asserts that it is nothing , fail , on this side and on that , to hit the truth]2236-the mystic who asserts that it is nothing , fail , on this side and on that , to hit the truth . " Yes , [I]263-aunt juley see , [dear]3859-dear ; it s about half - way between , "[263-aunt juley] [Aunt Juley]263-aunt juley had hazarded in earlier years . No ; truth , being alive , was not half - way between anything . It was only to be found by continuous excursions into either realm , and though proportion is the final secret , to espouse it at the outset is to insure sterility .

[Helen]254-helen , agreeing here , disagreeing there , would have talked till midnight , but [Margaret]255-margaret , with [her]255-margaret packing to do , focussed the conversation on [Henry]355-henry . [She]255-margaret might abuse [Henry]355-henry behind [his]355-henry back , but please would [she]255-margaret always be civil to [him]355-henry in company ? " [I]254-helen definitely dislike [him]355-henry , but [I]254-helen ll do what [I]254-helen can , "[254-helen] promised [Helen]254-helen . " Do what [you]255-margaret can with [[my]254-helen friends]4771-my friends in return . "[254-helen]

This conversation made [Margaret]255-margaret easier . [Their]2237-their inner life was so safe that [they]2237-their could bargain over externals in a way that would have been incredible to [Aunt Juley]263-aunt juley , and impossible for [Tibby]259-tibby or [Charles]258-charles . There are moments when the inner life actually " pays , "[254-helen] when years of self - scrutiny , conducted for no ulterior motive , are suddenly of practical use . Such moments are still rare in [the West]197-the west ; that they come at all promises a fairer future . [Margaret]255-margaret , though unable to understand [[her]255-margaret sister]544-her sister , was assured against estrangement , and returned to [London]2-london with a more peaceful mind .

The following morning , at eleven o clock , [she]255-margaret presented [herself]255-margaret at [the offices of [the Imperial and West African Rubber Company]2240-the imperial and west african rubber company]2239-the offices of the imperial and west african rubber company . [She]255-margaret was glad to go [there]884-there , for [Henry]355-henry had implied [his]355-henry business rather than described it , and the formlessness and vagueness that one associates with [Africa]70-africa itself had hitherto brooded over the main sources of [his]355-henry wealth . Not that a visit to [the office]3911-the office cleared things up . There was just the ordinary surface scum of ledgers and polished counters and brass bars that began and stopped for no possible reason , of electric - light globes blossoming in triplets , of little rabbit - hutches faced with glass or wire , of little rabbits . And even when [she]255-margaret penetrated to the inner depths , [she]255-margaret found only the ordinary table and Turkey carpet , and though the map over the fireplace did depict a helping of [West Africa]126-west africa , it was a very ordinary map . Another map hung opposite , on which [the whole continent]2243-the whole continent appeared , looking like a whale marked out for a blubber , and by its side was a door , shut , but [Henry]355-henry s voice came through it , dictating a " strong "[355-henry] letter . [She]255-margaret might have been at [the Porphyrion]396-the porphyrion , or [Dempster s Bank]193-dempster s bank , or [[her]255-margaret own wine - merchant]2244-her own wine - merchant s. Everything seems just alike in these days . But perhaps [she]255-margaret was seeing the Imperial side of [the company]832-the company rather than [its]832-the company [West African]200-west african , and [Imperialism]450-imperialism always had been one of [her]255-margaret difficulties .

" One minute ! "[258-charles] called [Mr. Wilcox]258-charles on receiving [her]255-margaret name . [He]258-charles touched a bell , the effect of which was to produce [Charles]258-charles .

[Charles]258-charles had written [[his]258-charles father]3994-his father an adequate letter -- more adequate than [Evie]262-evie s , through which a girlish indignation throbbed . And [he]258-charles greeted [[his]258-charles future stepmother]2247-his future stepmother with propriety .

[A motor - drive]2254-a motor - drive , a form of felicity detested by [Margaret]255-margaret , awaited [her]255-margaret . [Charles]258-charles saw [them]2252-they in , civil to the last , and in a moment [the offices of [the Imperial and West African Rubber Company]2240-the imperial and west african rubber company]2239-the offices of the imperial and west african rubber company faded away . But it was not an impressive drive . Perhaps the weather was to blame , being grey and banked high with weary clouds . Perhaps [Hertfordshire]73-hertfordshire is scarcely intended for [motorists]2257-motorists . Did not [a gentleman]669-a gentleman once motor so quickly through [Westmoreland]201-westmoreland that [he]669-a gentleman missed it ? and if [Westmoreland]201-westmoreland can be missed , it will fare ill with [a county whose delicate structure particularly needs the attentive eye]2259-a county whose delicate structure particularly needs the attentive eye . [Hertfordshire]73-hertfordshire is [England]34-england at [its]34-england quietest , with little emphasis of [river and hill]2260-river and hill ; it is [England]34-england meditative . If [Drayton]452-drayton were with [us]2261-us again to write a new edition of [his]452-drayton incomparable poem , [he]452-drayton would sing the nymphs of [Hertfordshire]73-hertfordshire as indeterminate of feature , with hair obfuscated by the [London]2-london smoke . [Their]2262-they eyes would be sad , and averted from [their]2262-they fate towards [the Northern flats]2263-the northern flats , [[their]2262-they leader]2264-their leader not [Isis]453-isis or [Sabrina]454-sabrina , but the slowly flowing [Lea]202-lea . No glory of raiment would be [theirs]2262-they , no urgency of dance ; but [they]2262-they would be [real nymphs]2265-real nymphs .

[The chauffeur]1445-the chauffeur could not travel as quickly as [he]1445-the chauffeur had hoped , for [the Great North Road]640-the great north road was full of Easter traffic . " The motor s come to stay , "[258-charles] [he]258-charles answered . " [One]3797-one must get about . There s [a pretty church]5193-a pretty church -- oh , [you]5194-you aren t sharp enough . [She]255-margaret looked at the scenery . [It]2269-it heaved and merged like porridge . Presently it congealed . [They]2270-they had arrived .

[[Charles]258-charles s house]2271-charles s house on the left ; on the right the swelling forms of [the Six Hills]203-the six hills . [Their]2270-they appearance in such [a neighbourhood]2272-a neighbourhood surprised [her]255-margaret . [They]2270-they interrupted the stream of [residences]2273-residences that was thickening up towards [Hilton]32-hilton . Beyond [them]2270-they [she]255-margaret saw meadows and a wood , and beneath [them]2270-they [she]255-margaret settled that [soldiers of the best kind]2274-soldiers of the best kind lay buried . [She]255-margaret hated war and liked [soldiers]652-soldiers -- it was one of [her]255-margaret amiable inconsistencies .

But here was [Dolly]2276-dolly , dressed up to the nines , standing at the door to greet [them]2270-they , and here were the first drops of the rain . [They]2270-they ran in gaily , and after a long wait in [the drawing - room]4101-the drawing - room , sat down to the rough - and - ready lunch , every dish of which concealed or exuded cream . [Mr. Bryce]451-mr. bryce was the chief topic of conversation . [Dolly]2278-dolly described [his]2278-dolly visit with the key , while [[her]255-margaret father - in - law]1389-her father - in - law gave satisfaction by chaffing [her]255-margaret and contradicting all [she]255-margaret said . It was evidently the custom to laugh at [Dolly]2280-dolly . [He]2278-dolly chaffed [Margaret]255-margaret too , and [Margaret]255-margaret roused from a grave meditation was pleased and chaffed [him]2278-dolly back . [Dolly]2281-dolly seemed surprised and eyed [her]255-margaret curiously . After lunch [the two children]2282-the two children came down . [Margaret]255-margaret disliked [babies]609-babies , but hit it off better with [the two - year - old]2284-the two - year - old , and sent [Dolly]2285-dolly into fits of laughter by talking sense to [him]2278-dolly . " Kiss [them]2282-the two children now , and come away , "[258-charles] said [Mr. Wilcox]258-charles . [She]255-margaret came , but refused to kiss [them]2282-the two children ; it was such hard luck on the little things , [she]255-margaret said , and though [Dolly]2286-dolly proffered Chorly - worly and Porgly - woggles in turn , [she]255-margaret was obdurate .

By this time it was raining steadily . [The car]1432-the car came round with the hood up , and again [she]255-margaret lost all sense of space . In a few minutes [they]2282-the two children stopped , and [Crane]364-crane opened the door of [the car]1432-the car .

" What s happened ? "[255-margaret] asked [Margaret]255-margaret .

" What do [you]255-margaret suppose ? "[355-henry] said [Henry]355-henry .

[A little porch]2289-a little porch was close up against [her]255-margaret face .

" Are [we]2282-the two children there already ? "[255-margaret]

" [We]2282-the two children are . "[255-margaret]

" Well , [I]255-margaret never ! In years ago it seemed so far away . "[255-margaret]

Smiling , but somehow disillusioned , [she]255-margaret jumped out , and [her]255-margaret impetus carried [her]255-margaret to the front - door . [She]255-margaret was about to open it , when [Henry]355-henry said : " That s no good ; it s locked . Who s got the key ? "[355-henry]

As [he]355-henry had [himself]355-henry forgotten to call for the key at [the farm]3825-the farm , [no one]633-no one replied . [He]355-henry also wanted to know who had left the front gate open , since a cow had strayed in from [the road]999-the road , and was spoiling [the croquet lawn]2293-the croquet lawn . Then [he]355-henry said rather crossly : " [Margaret]255-margaret , [you]255-margaret wait in the dry . [I]355-henry ll go down for the key . It isn t a hundred yards . "[355-henry]

" Mayn t [I]355-henry come too ? "[355-henry]

" No ; [I]355-henry shall be back before [I]355-henry m gone . "[355-henry]

Then [the car]1432-the car turned away , and it was as if a curtain had risen . For the second time that day [she]255-margaret saw the appearance of [the earth]1372-the earth .

There were the greengage - trees that [Helen]254-helen had once described , there [the tennis lawn]2296-the tennis lawn , there the hedge that would be glorious with dog - roses in June , but the vision now was of black and palest green . Down by the dell - hole more vivid colours were awakening , and Lent lilies stood sentinel on its margin , or advanced in battalions over the grass . Tulips were a tray of jewels . [She]255-margaret could not see the wych - elm tree , but a branch of the celebrated vine , studded with velvet knobs had covered the perch . [She]255-margaret was struck by the fertility of the soil ; [she]255-margaret had seldom been in [a garden]2297-a garden where the flowers looked so well , and even the weeds [she]255-margaret was idly plucking out of [the porch]1450-the porch were intensely green . Why had [poor Mr. Bryce]451-mr. bryce fled from all this beauty ? For [she]255-margaret had already decided that [the place]5183-the place was beautiful .

" [Naughty cow]5196-naughty cow ! Go away ! "[255-margaret] cried [Margaret]255-margaret to the cow , but without indignation .

Harder came the rain , pouring out of a windless sky , and spattering up from the notice - boards of [the house]3796-the house - agents , which lay in a row on [the lawn where [Charles]258-charles had hurled them]2301-the lawn where charles had hurled them . [She]255-margaret must have interviewed [Charles]258-charles in another world -- where [one did have interviews]2302-one did have interviews . How [Helen]254-helen would revel in such a notion ! [Charles]258-charles dead , [all people]2303-all people dead , nothing alive but [houses]4042-houses and [gardens]2305-gardens . [The obvious dead]2306-the obvious dead , [the intangible alive]2307-the intangible alive , and no connection at all between [them]2308-them ! [Margaret]255-margaret smiled . Would that [her]255-margaret own fancies were as clear - cut ! Would that [she]255-margaret could deal as high - handedly with [the world]745-the world ! Smiling and sighing , [she]255-margaret laid [her]255-margaret hand upon the door . It opened . [The house]3796-the house was not locked up at all .

[She]255-margaret hesitated . Ought [she]255-margaret to wait for [Henry]355-henry ? [He]355-henry felt strongly about [property]1873-property , and might prefer to show [her]255-margaret over [himself]355-henry . On the other hand , [he]355-henry had told [her]255-margaret to keep in the dry , and [the porch]1450-the porch was beginning to drip . So [she]255-margaret went in , and the draught from inside slammed the door behind .

Desolation greeted [her]255-margaret . Dirty finger - prints were on the hall - windows , flue and rubbish on [its]3796-the house unwashed boards . The civilisation of luggage had been [here]3846-here for a month , and then decamped . [Dining - room]3790-dining - room and [drawing - room]3791-drawing - room -- right and left -- were guessed only by [their]2316-their wallpapers . They were [just rooms where [one]3797-one could shelter from the rain]2317-just rooms where one could shelter from the rain . Across the ceiling of each ran a great beam . [The dining - room]3978-the dining - room and [hall]3788-hall revealed [theirs]2316-their openly , but [the drawing - room s]2321-the drawing - room s was match - boarded -- because the facts of life must be concealed from [ladies]983-ladies ? [Drawing - room]3791-drawing - room , [dining - room]3790-dining - room , and [hall]3788-hall -- how petty the names sounded ! [Here]3846-here were simply [three rooms where [children]4568-children could play and [friends]3831-friends shelter from the rain]2327-three rooms where children could play and friends shelter from the rain . Yes , and they were beautiful .

Then [she]255-margaret opened one of the doors opposite -- there were two -- and exchanged wall - papers for whitewash . It was the servants part , though [she]255-margaret scarcely realised that : just [rooms]2330-rooms again , where [friends]3831-friends might shelter . [The garden at the back]2332-the garden at the back was full of flowering cherries and plums . Farther on were hints of [the meadow]3817-the meadow and a black cliff of pines . Yes , [the meadow]3817-the meadow was beautiful .

Penned in by the desolate weather , [she]255-margaret recaptured the sense of space which the motor had tried to rob from [her]255-margaret . [She]255-margaret remembered again that ten square miles are not ten times as wonderful as one square mile , that a thousand square miles are not practically the same as [heaven]768-heaven . The phantom of bigness , which [London]2-london encourages , was laid for ever when [she]255-margaret paced from [the hall at [Howards End]1-howards end]2336-the hall at howards end to [[its]2336-the hall at howards end kitchen]2337-its kitchen and heard the rain run this way and that where the watershed of the roof divided [it]2336-the hall at howards end .

Now [Helen]254-helen came to [her]254-helen mind , scrutinising half [Wessex]22-wessex from [the ridge of [the Purbeck Downs]204-the purbeck downs]2338-the ridge of the purbeck downs , and saying : " [You]254-helen will have to lose something . "[254-helen] [She]254-helen was not so sure . For instance [she]254-helen would double [[her]254-helen kingdom]2339-her kingdom by opening the door that concealed the stairs .

Now [she]254-helen thought of the map of [Africa]70-africa ; of [empires]2340-empires ; of [[her]254-helen father]822-her father ; of [the two supreme nations]2342-the two supreme nations , streams of whose life warmed [her]254-helen blood , but , mingling , had cooled [her]254-helen brain . [She]254-helen paced back into [the hall]948-the hall , and as [she]254-helen did so [the house]3796-the house reverberated .

" Is that [you]5197-you , [Henry]355-henry ? "[254-helen] [she]254-helen called .

There was no answer , but [the house]3796-the house reverberated again .

" [Henry]355-henry , have [you]5197-you got in ? "[254-helen]

But it was the heart of [the house]3796-the house beating , faintly at first , then loudly , martially . It dominated the rain .

It is the starved imagination , not the well - nourished , that is afraid . [Margaret]255-margaret flung open the door to the stairs . A noise as of drums seemed to deafen [her]255-margaret . [A woman]1045-a woman , [an old woman]2348-an old woman , was descending , with figure erect , with face impassive , with lips that parted and said dryly :

" Oh ! Well , [I]1045-a woman took [you]255-margaret for [Ruth Wilcox]354-ruth . "[1045-a woman]

[Margaret]255-margaret stammered : " [I]255-margaret -- [Mrs. Wilcox]512-mrs. wilcox -- [I]255-margaret ? "[255-margaret]

" In fancy , of course -- in fancy . [You]255-margaret had [her]4711-the old woman way of walking . Good - day . "[4711-the old woman] And [the old woman]4711-the old woman passed out into the rain .

CHAPTER XXIV

" It gave [her]4711-the old woman quite a turn , "[258-charles] said [Mr. Wilcox]258-charles , when retailing the incident to [Dolly]2350-dolly at tea - time . " [None of [you]255-margaret girls]5198-none of you girls have any nerves , really . Of course , a word from [me]258-charles put it all right , but [silly old Miss Avery]456-miss avery -- [she]456-miss avery frightened [you]255-margaret , didn t [she]456-miss avery , [Margaret]255-margaret ? There [you]255-margaret stood clutching a bunch of weeds . [She]456-miss avery might have said something , instead of coming down the stairs with that alarming bonnet on . [I]258-charles passed [her]456-miss avery as [I]258-charles came in . Enough to make [the car]1432-the car shy . [Margaret]457-margaret smiled . [Crane]364-crane had had enough tea , and was sent to [the garage]1398-the garage , where [[their]2363-they car]2368-their car had been trickling muddy water over [Charles]258-charles s. " Curious mounds , "[355-henry] said [Henry]355-henry , " but in with [you]2369-she now ; another time . "[355-henry] [He]258-charles had to be up in [London]2-london by seven -- if possible , by six - thirty . Once more [she]2369-she lost the sense of space ; once more trees , [houses]4042-houses , [people]3992-people , animals , [hills]2372-hills , merged and heaved into one dirtiness , and [she]2369-she was at [Wickham Place]11-wickham place .

[Her]2369-she evening was pleasant . The sense of flux which had haunted [her]2369-she all the year disappeared for a time . [She]2369-she forgot the luggage and [the motor - cars]2373-the motor - cars , and [the hurrying men who know so much and connect so little]2374-the hurrying men who know so much and connect so little . [She]2369-she recaptured the sense of space , which is the basis of all earthly beauty , and , starting from [Howards End]1-howards end , [she]2369-she attempted to realise [England]34-england . [She]2369-she failed -- visions do not come when [we]2375-we try , though they may come through trying . But an unexpected love of [the island]2038-the island awoke in [her]2369-she , connecting on this side with the joys of the flesh , on that with the inconceivable . [Helen]254-helen and [[her]254-helen father]822-her father had known this love , poor [Leonard Bast]311-leonard was groping after it , but it had been hidden from [Margaret]457-margaret till this afternoon . It had certainly come through [the house]3796-the house and [old Miss Avery]456-miss avery . Through [them]2379-them : the notion of " through "[2379-them] persisted ; [her]2369-she mind trembled towards a conclusion which only the unwise have put into words . Then , veering back into warmth , it dwelt on ruddy bricks , flowering plum - trees , and all the tangible joys of spring .

[Henry]355-henry , after allaying [her]2369-she agitation , had taken [her]2369-she over [[his]355-henry property]2380-his property , and had explained to [her]2369-she the use and dimensions of [the various rooms]2381-the various rooms . [He]355-henry had sketched the history of [the little estate]2382-the little estate . " It is so unlucky , "[2383-two women] ran the monologue , " that money wasn t put into it about fifty years ago . Then [it]2382-the little estate had four -- five -- times [the land]5232-the land -- [thirty acres]5233-thirty acres at least . [One]3797-one could have made something out of [it]2382-the little estate then -- [a small park]5235-a small park , or at all events shrubberies , and rebuilt [the house]3796-the house farther away from [the road]999-the road . What s the good of taking it in hand now ? Nothing but [the meadow]3817-the meadow left , and even that was heavily mortgaged when [I]2383-two women first had to do with things -- yes , and [the house]3796-the house too . Oh , it was no joke . "[2383-two women] [She]2369-she saw [two women]2383-two women as [he]355-henry spoke , [one old]2384-one old , [the other young]2385-the other young , watching [their]2383-two women inheritance melt away . [She]2369-she saw [them]2383-two women greet [him]355-henry as [a deliverer]2386-a deliverer . " Mismanagement did it -- besides , the days for [small farms]5240-small farms are over . It doesn t pay -- except with intensive cultivation . [Small holdings]5241-small holdings , back to [the land]5232-the land -- ah ! [philanthropic bunkum]5243-philanthropic bunkum . Take it as a rule that nothing pays on a small scale . Most of [the land [you]5245-you see]5244-the land you see ( [they]2383-two women were standing at an upper window , the only one which faced west ) belongs to [the people at [the Park]5247-the park]5246-the people at the park -- [they]2383-two women made [their]2383-two women pile over copper -- [good chaps]5248-good chaps . [[Avery]456-miss avery s Farm]5249-avery s farm , [Sishe]460-sishe s -- what [they]2383-two women call [the Common]205-the common , where [you]5245-you see that ruined oak -- one after the other fell in , and so did this , as near as is no matter . "[2369-she] But [Henry]355-henry had saved it as near as is no matter without fine feelings or deep insight , but [he]355-henry had saved it , and [she]2387-she loved [him]355-henry for the deed . " When [I]355-henry had more control [I]355-henry did what [I]355-henry could -- sold off the two and a half animals , and the mangy pony , and the superannuated tools ; pulled down [the outhouses]5250-the outhouses ; drained ; thinned out [I]355-henry don t know how many guelder - roses and [elder]5251-elder - trees ; and inside [the house]3796-the house [I]355-henry turned [the old kitchen]5253-the old kitchen into [a hall]5254-a hall , and made [a kitchen behind where [the dairy]5256-the dairy was]5255-a kitchen behind where the dairy was . [Garage]5257-garage and so on came later . But [one]3797-one could still tell [it]3796-the house s been [an old farm]5259-an old farm . And yet [it]3796-the house isn t the place that would fetch [one of [[your]5261-your artistic crew]5262-your artistic crew]5260-one of your artistic crew . "[355-henry] No , it wasn t ; and if [he]2388-he did not quite understand it , [the artistic crew]2389-the artistic crew would still less ; it was [English]461-the english , and the wych - elm that [she]2390-she saw from the window was an English tree . No report had prepared [her]2390-she for its peculiar glory . [It]2391-it was neither [warrior]2392-warrior , nor [lover]2393-lover , nor god ; in none of these roles do [the English]461-the english excel . [It]2394-it was [a comrade bending over the house]2395-a comrade bending over the house , strength and adventure in its roots , but in its utmost fingers tenderness , and the girth , that [a dozen men]2396-a dozen men could not have spanned , became in the end evanescent , till pale bud clusters seemed to float in the air . [It]2394-it was [a comrade]2397-a comrade . House and tree transcended any similes of sex . [Margaret]457-margaret thought of [them]2398-them now , and was to think of [them]2398-them through many a windy night and [London]2-london day , but to compare either to [man]3959-man , to [woman]3834-woman , always dwarfed the vision . Yet [they]2398-them kept within limits of [the human]2401-the human . [Their]2398-them message was not of eternity , but of hope on this side of the grave . As [she]2390-she stood in [the one]2402-the one , gazing at the other , truer relationship had gleamed .

Another touch , and the account of [her]2390-she day is finished . [They]2398-them entered [the garden]3800-the garden for a minute , and to [Mr. Wilcox]258-charles s surprise [she]2390-she was right . Teeth , pigs teeth , could be seen in the bark of the wych - elm tree -- just the white tips of them showing . " Extraordinary ! "[258-charles] [he]258-charles cried . " Who told [you]2390-she ? " [I]2390-she heard of it one winter in [London]2-london , "[2390-she] was [her]2390-she answer , for [she]2390-she , too , avoided mentioning [Mrs. Wilcox]512-mrs. wilcox by name .

CHAPTER XXV

[Evie]262-evie heard of [[her]262-evie father]822-her father s engagement when [she]262-evie was in for a tennis tournament , and [her]262-evie play went simply to pot . That [she]262-evie should marry and leave [him]822-her father had seemed natural enough ; that [he]822-her father , left alone , should do the same was deceitful ; and now [Charles]258-charles and [Dolly]2405-dolly said that it was all [her]262-evie fault . " But [I]262-evie never dreamt of such a thing , "[262-evie] [she]262-evie grumbled . " [Dad]462-dad took [me]262-evie to call now and then , and made [me]262-evie ask [her]512-mrs. wilcox to [Simpson]411-simpson s. Well , [I]262-evie m altogether off [dad]5263-dad . "[262-evie] It was also an insult to [[their]2406-their mother]1395-their mother s memory ; there [they]2406-their were agreed , and [Evie]262-evie had the idea of returning [Mrs. Wilcox]512-mrs. wilcox s lace and jewellery " as a protest . "[262-evie] Against what it would protest [she]262-evie was not clear ; but being only eighteen , the idea of renunciation appealed to [her]262-evie , the more as [she]262-evie did not care for jewellery or lace . [Dolly]2408-dolly then suggested that [she]2408-dolly and [Uncle Percy]439-uncle percy should pretend to break off [their]2406-their engagement , and then perhaps [Mr. Wilcox]258-charles would quarrel with [Miss Schlegel]254-helen , and break off [his]258-charles ; or [Paul]256-paul might be cabled for . But at this point [Charles]258-charles told [them]2406-their not to talk nonsense . So [Evie]262-evie settled to marry as soon as possible ; it was no good hanging about with these [Schlegels]267-the schlegels eyeing [her]262-evie . The date of [her]262-evie wedding was consequently put forward from September to August , and in the intoxication of presents [she]262-evie recovered much of [her]262-evie good - humour .

[Margaret]457-margaret found that [she]457-margaret was expected to figure at this function , and to figure largely ; it would be such an opportunity , said [Henry]355-henry , for [her]457-margaret to get to know [his]355-henry set . [Sir James Bidder]463-sir james bidder would be [there]884-there , and [all the Cahills]2410-all the cahills and [the Fussells]340-the fussells , and [[his]355-henry sister - in - law]2411-his sister - in - law , [Mrs. Warrington Wilcox]257-mrs. wilcox , had fortunately got back from [her]257-mrs. wilcox tour round [the world]745-the world . [Henry]355-henry [she]457-margaret loved , but [his]355-henry set promised to be another matter . [He]355-henry had not the knack of surrounding [himself]355-henry with [nice people]2413-nice people -- indeed , for [a man of ability and virtue]2414-a man of ability and virtue [his]355-henry choice had been singularly unfortunate ; [he]355-henry had no guiding principle beyond a certain preference for mediocrity ; [he]355-henry was content to settle one of the greatest things in life haphazard , and so , while [his]355-henry investments went right , [[his]355-henry friends]1779-his friends generally went wrong . [She]457-margaret would be told , " Oh , So - and - so s [a good sort]5264-a good sort -- [a thundering good sort]5265-a thundering good sort , "[457-margaret] and find , on meeting [him]355-henry , that [he]355-henry was [a brute]2416-a brute or [a bore]2417-a bore . If [Henry]355-henry had shown real affection , [she]457-margaret would have understood , for affection explains everything . But [he]355-henry seemed without sentiment . [The " thundering good sort "]5266-the " thundering good sort "[5266-the " thundering good sort "] might at any moment become " a fellow for whom [I]5266-the " thundering good sort " never did have much use , and have less now , "[5266-the " thundering good sort "] and be shaken off cheerily into oblivion . [Margaret]457-margaret had done the same as [a schoolgirl]2418-a schoolgirl . Now [she]457-margaret never forgot [any one for whom [she]457-margaret had once cared]2419-any one for whom she had once cared ; [she]457-margaret connected , though the connection might be bitter , and [she]457-margaret hoped that some day [Henry]355-henry would do the same .

[Evie]262-evie was not to be married from [Ducie Street]130-ducie street . [She]457-margaret had a fancy for something rural , and , besides , [no one]633-no one would be in [London]2-london then , so [she]457-margaret left [her]457-margaret boxes for a few weeks at [Oniton Grange]206-oniton grange , and [her]457-margaret banns were duly published in [the parish church]2421-the parish church , and for a couple of days [the little town]2422-the little town , dreaming between [the ruddy hills]2423-the ruddy hills , was roused by the clang of [our]2424-our civilisation , and drew up by the roadside to let the motors pass . [Oniton]255-margaret had been a discovery of [Mr. Wilcox]258-charles s -- a discovery of which [he]258-charles was not altogether proud . [It]255-margaret was up towards [the Welsh border]2425-the welsh border , and so difficult of access that [he]258-charles had concluded it must be something special . [A ruined castle]2426-a ruined castle stood in [the grounds]2427-the grounds . But having got [there]884-there , what was one to do ? The shooting was bad , the fishing indifferent , and [womenfolk]2429-womenfolk reported the scenery as nothing much . [The place]5183-the place turned out to be in [the wrong part of [Shropshire]132-shropshire]2431-the wrong part of shropshire , and though [he]258-charles never ran down [[his]258-charles own property]2432-his own property to [others]802-others , [he]258-charles was only waiting to get it off [his]258-charles hands , and then to let fly . [Evie]262-evie s marriage was its last appearance in public . As soon as [a tenant]2434-a tenant was found , [it]2435-it became [a house for which [he]258-charles never had had much use , and had less now , and , like [Howards End]1-howards end]2436-a house for which he never had had much use , and had less now , and , like howards end , faded into [Limbo]207-limbo .

But on [Margaret Oniton]255-margaret was destined to make a lasting impression . [She]255-margaret regarded [it]2435-it as [[her]255-margaret future home]2437-her future home , and was anxious to start straight with [the clergy]2438-the clergy , etc . , and , if possible , to see something of the local life . [It]2435-it was [a market - town]2439-a market - town -- as tiny a one as [England]34-england possesses -- and had for ages served [that lonely valley]2440-that lonely valley , and guarded [our]2441-our marches against [the Celt]465-the celt . In spite of the occasion , in spite of the numbing hilarity that greeted [her]255-margaret as soon as [she]255-margaret got into [the reserved saloon at [Paddington]16-paddington]2442-the reserved saloon at paddington , [her]255-margaret senses were awake and watching , and though [Oniton]255-margaret was to prove one of [her]255-margaret innumerable false starts , [she]255-margaret never forgot it , or the things that happened there .

The [London]2-london party only numbered eight -- [the Fussells]340-the fussells , [father]699-father and [son]698-son , [two Anglo - Indian ladies]2445-two anglo - indian ladies named [Mrs. Plynlimmon]466-mrs. plynlimmon and [Lady Edser]467-lady edser , [Mrs. Warrington Wilcox]257-mrs. wilcox and [[her]257-mrs. wilcox daughter]1308-her daughter , and , lastly , [the little girl]4494-the little girl , very smart and quiet , who figures at so many weddings , and who kept a watchful eye on [Margaret]255-margaret , [the bride - elect]2448-the bride - elect . [Dolly]2449-dolly was absent -- a domestic event detained [her]2449-dolly at [Hilton]32-hilton ; [Paul]256-paul had cabled a humorous message ; [Charles]258-charles was to meet [them]2450-they with a trio of motors at [Shrewsbury]208-shrewsbury ; [Helen]254-helen had refused [her]254-helen invitation ; [Tibby]259-tibby had never answered [his]259-tibby . The management was excellent , as was to be expected with anything that [Henry]355-henry undertook ; [one]3797-one was conscious of [his]355-henry sensible and generous brain in the background . [They]2450-they were [[his]355-henry guests]2452-his guests as soon as [they]2450-they reached [the train]3864-the train ; a special label for [their]2450-they luggage ; [a courier]2454-a courier ; a special lunch ; [they]2450-they had only to look pleasant and , where possible , pretty . [Margaret]255-margaret thought with dismay of [her]255-margaret own nuptials -- presumably under the management of [Tibby]259-tibby . " [Mr. Theobald Schlegel]271-mr. schlegel and [Miss Helen Schlegel]254-helen request the pleasure of [Mrs. Plynlimmon]466-mrs. plynlimmon s company on the occasion of the marriage of [[their]2450-they sister]5267-their sister [Margaret]255-margaret . "[2455-its guests] The formula was incredible , but it must soon be printed and sent , and though [Wickham Place]11-wickham place need not compete with [Oniton]255-margaret , [it]11-wickham place must feed [[its]11-wickham place guests]2455-its guests properly , and provide [them]2455-its guests with sufficient chairs . [Her]255-margaret wedding would either be ramshackly or bourgeois -- [she]255-margaret hoped the latter . Such an affair as the present , staged with a deftness that was almost beautiful , lay beyond [her]255-margaret powers and those of [[her]255-margaret friends]1208-her friends .

The low rich purr of [a Great Western express]2457-a great western express is not the worst background for conversation , and the journey passed pleasantly enough . Nothing could have exceeded the kindness of [the two men]1466-the two men . [They]1466-the two men raised windows for [some ladies]5043-some ladies , and lowered [them]2460-them for [others]802-others , [they]1466-the two men rang the bell for [the servant]2462-the servant , [they]1466-the two men identified [the colleges]2463-the colleges as [the train]3864-the train slipped past [Oxford]96-oxford , [they]1466-the two men caught books or bag - purses in the act of tumbling on to the floor . Yet there was nothing finicking about [their]1466-the two men politeness -- it had the public - school touch , and , though sedulous , was virile . More battles than Waterloo have been won on [[our]2465-our playing - fields]2466-our playing - fields , and [Margaret]255-margaret bowed to a charm of which [she]255-margaret did not wholly approve , and said nothing when the [Oxford colleges]2467-oxford colleges were identified wrongly . " Male and [female]5268-female created [He]5269-he [them]2467-oxford colleges "[255-margaret] ; the journey to [Shrewsbury]208-shrewsbury confirmed this questionable statement , and [the long glass saloon]2468-the long glass saloon , that moved so easily and felt so comfortable , became a forcing - house for the idea of sex .

At [Shrewsbury]208-shrewsbury came fresh air . [Margaret]255-margaret was all for sight - seeing , and while [the others]3989-the others were finishing [their]3989-the others tea at [the Raven]209-the raven , [she]255-margaret annexed a motor and hurried over [the astonishing city]2470-the astonishing city . [[Her]255-margaret chauffeur]2471-her chauffeur was not [the faithful Crane]2472-the faithful crane , but [an Italian , who dearly loved making [her]255-margaret late]2473-an italian , who dearly loved making her late . [Charles]258-charles , watch in hand , though with a level brow , was standing in front of [the hotel]2474-the hotel when [they]2475-they returned . It was perfectly all right , [he]258-charles told [her]255-margaret ; [she]255-margaret was by no means the last . And then [he]258-charles dived into [the coffee - room]2476-the coffee - room , and [she]255-margaret heard [him]258-charles say , " For God s sake , hurry [the women]5270-the women up ; [we]2475-they shall never be off , "[258-charles] and [Albert Fussell]337-albert fussell reply , " Not [I]468-colonel fussell ; [I]468-colonel fussell ve done [my]468-colonel fussell share , "[468-colonel fussell] and [Colonel Fussell]468-colonel fussell opine that [the ladies]957-the ladies were getting [themselves]957-the ladies up to kill . [Presently Myra]469-presently myra ( [[Mrs. Warrington]257-mrs. wilcox s daughter]2478-mrs. warrington s daughter ) appeared , and as [she]2478-mrs. warrington s daughter was [[his]258-charles cousin]2479-his cousin , [Charles]258-charles blew [her]2478-mrs. warrington s daughter up a little ; [she]2478-mrs. warrington s daughter had been changing [her]2478-mrs. warrington s daughter smart travelling hat for a smart motor hat . Then [Mrs. Warrington]257-mrs. wilcox [herself]257-mrs. wilcox , leading [the quiet child]2480-the quiet child ; [the two Anglo - Indian ladies]2481-the two anglo - indian ladies were always last . [Maids]2482-maids , [courier , heavy luggage]2483-courier , heavy luggage , had already gone on by a branch - line to [a station nearer [Oniton]255-margaret]2484-a station nearer oniton , but there were five hat - boxes and four dressing - bags to be packed , and five dust - cloaks to be put on , and to be put off at the last moment , because [Charles]258-charles declared [them]2483-courier , heavy luggage not necessary . [The men]1547-the men presided over everything with unfailing good - humour . By half - past five [the party]4832-the party was ready , and went out of [Shrewsbury]208-shrewsbury by [the Welsh Bridge]2487-the welsh bridge .

[Shropshire]132-shropshire had not the reticence of [Hertfordshire]73-hertfordshire . Though robbed of half its magic by swift movement , it still conveyed the sense of [hills]2372-hills . [They]1547-the men were nearing the buttresses that force [the Severn]210-the severn eastward and make [it]210-the severn [an English stream]2489-an english stream , and the sun , sinking over [the Sentinels of [Wales]135-wales]2490-the sentinels of wales , was straight in [their]1547-the men eyes . Having picked up [another guest]2491-another guest , [they]1547-the men turned southward , avoiding [the greater mountains]2492-the greater mountains , but conscious of [an occasional summit]2493-an occasional summit , rounded and mild , whose colouring differed in quality from that of [the lower earth]2494-the lower earth , and whose contours altered more slowly . Quiet mysteries were in progress behind those tossing horizons : [the West]2495-the west , as ever , was retreating with some secret which may not be worth the discovery , but which [no practical man]2496-no practical man will ever discover .

[They]1547-the men spoke of [Tariff Reform]471-tariff reform .

[Mrs. Warrington]257-mrs. wilcox was just back from [the Colonies]2497-the colonies . Like [many other critics of [Empire]472-empire]2498-many other critics of empire , [her]257-mrs. wilcox mouth had been stopped with food , and [she]257-mrs. wilcox could only exclaim at the hospitality with which [she]257-mrs. wilcox had been received , and warn [the Mother Country]368-mother against trifling with [young Titans]473-young titans . " [They]1547-the men threaten to cut [the painter]5271-the painter , "[257-mrs. wilcox] [she]257-mrs. wilcox cried , " and where shall [we]2499-their be then ? [Margaret]255-margaret playfully confessed [herself]255-margaret on the other side , and [they]2499-their began to quote from [their]2499-their respective handbooks while the motor carried [them]2499-their deep into [the hills]2052-the hills . [Curious]3-germany [these]2501-these were rather than impressive , for [their]2499-their outlines lacked beauty , and the pink fields on [their]2499-their summits suggested the handkerchiefs of a giant spread out to dry . [An occasional outcrop of rock]2502-an occasional outcrop of rock , [an occasional wood]2503-an occasional wood , [an occasional " forest , "[2499-their] treeless and brown]2504-an occasional " forest , " treeless and brown , all hinted at wildness to follow , but the main colour was an agricultural green . [Charles]258-charles was absolutely honest . [He]258-charles described what [he]258-charles believed to have happened . [Albert]337-albert fussell had flattened out a cat , and [Miss Schlegel]254-helen had lost [her]254-helen nerve , as [any woman]5017-any woman might . " It is all very well , "[2559-the colonel] [he]2559-the colonel reflected , " [the pater]5100-the pater s saying that [he]5100-the pater will be just to all , but [one]3797-one can t be just indefinitely . Money isn t elastic . What s to happen if [Evie]262-evie has [a family]742-a family ? And , come to that , so may [the pater]5100-the pater . There ll not be enough to go round , for there s none coming in , either through [Dolly]458-dorothea or [Percy]439-uncle percy . It s damnable ! "[2559-the colonel] [He]2559-the colonel looked enviously at [the Grange]2573-the grange , whose windows poured light and laughter . First and last , this wedding would cost a pretty penny . " Every one for [himself]2559-the colonel , "[2559-the colonel] [he]2559-the colonel repeated -- a maxim which had cheered [him]2559-the colonel in the past , but which rang grimly enough among [the ruins of [Oniton]255-margaret]2579-the ruins of oniton . [He]2559-the colonel lacked [[his]2559-the colonel father]3994-his father s ability in business , and so had an ever higher regard for money ; unless [he]2559-the colonel could inherit plenty , [he]2559-the colonel feared to leave [[his]2559-the colonel children]805-his children poor .

As [he]2559-the colonel sat thinking , [one of [the ladies]957-the ladies]2582-one of the ladies left [the terrace]2584-the terrace and walked into [the meadow]3817-the meadow ; [he]2559-the colonel recognised [her]2582-one of the ladies as [Margaret]255-margaret by the white bandage that gleamed on [her]2582-one of the ladies arm , and put out [his]2559-the colonel cigar , lest the gleam should betray [him]2559-the colonel . [She]2582-one of the ladies climbed up the mound in zigzags , and at times stooped down , as if [she]2582-one of the ladies was stroking the turf . It sounds absolutely incredible , but for a moment [Charles]258-charles thought that [she]2582-one of the ladies was in love with [him]2559-the colonel , and had come out to tempt [him]2559-the colonel . [Charles]258-charles believed in temptresses , who are indeed [the strong man]2586-the strong man s necessary complement , and having no sense of humour , [he]258-charles could not purge [himself]258-charles of the thought by a smile . [[Margaret]255-margaret , who was engaged to [[his]2559-the colonel father]3994-his father , and [[his]2559-the colonel sister s wedding - guest]2589-his sister s wedding - guest]2587-margaret , who was engaged to his father , and his sister s wedding - guest , kept on [her]255-margaret way without noticing [him]2559-the colonel , and [he]2559-the colonel admitted that [he]2559-the colonel had wronged [her]2582-one of the ladies on this point . " [Saxon]477-saxon or [Celt]465-the celt ? "[2582-one of the ladies] [she]2582-one of the ladies continued , laughing in the darkness . " But it doesn t matter .
